name: The Golden Urn
desc: Interlace fingers, palms up. Reach to sky, then circle your torso like you're scraping the inside of a giant bowl.

name: Drawing the Bow
desc: Step into a wide stance. Mimic pulling a heavy bow string back, opening your chest and twisting your neck.

name: Knees to Heavens
desc: Slowly lift one knee as high as possible while reaching the opposite hand to the sky. Balance and length.

name: Touching the Toes (Ancient Style)
desc: Hinge down, but instead of reaching for toes, try to place your palms flat on the floor. Hold 1 min.

name: The Thousand Steps
desc: Walk in place, but with every step, focus on rolling the foot from heel to toe with extreme intent.

name: Plucking the Stars
desc: Reach one hand high and one hand low. Imagine you are stretching your spine from both ends.

name: The Wise Owl
desc: Rotate your head to look behind you while pulling your shoulder blades together. Reverses hunching.

name: The Archer’s Pose
desc: Wide stance. Turn one foot out. Reach arms out and imagine pulling a massive bow string.

name: Circling the Hips (Old Style)
desc: Hands on lower back. Draw the largest circle possible with your hips. Lubricates the L5-S1.

name: The Heavens-Earth Press
desc: One hand pushes up, one hand pushes down. Imagine you are separating the sky and the floor.

name: The Flowing Stream
desc: Move your arms as if you are moving through water. No tension, just smooth, continuous motion.

name: The Great Pivot
desc: Stand tall. Pivot on your heels 180 degrees without leaning. Pure balance and hip rotation.

name: The Mountain Stand
desc: Stand perfectly still for 5 minutes. Distribute weight evenly. The ultimate stillness test.

name: The Finger-Tap Scale
desc: Tap thumb to index, middle, ring, pinky, then reverse. Try different patterns on each hand.

name: The 'Eyes-Lead' Neck Circle
desc: Move head in a circle, but eyes must reach the next 'corner' before the head does.

name: The 'Mirror' Wrist Circle
desc: Rotate one wrist clockwise and the other counter-clockwise. Switch directions mid-motion.

name: The 'Alphabet' Spine
desc: Try to 'write' the letter A with your hips, B with your ribs, C with your neck. Slow and controlled.

name: The Nose-Figure-8
desc: Draw a small figure-8 with the tip of your nose. Then draw a giant one. Improves cervical glide.

name: The 'Opposite' Hand Circle
desc: Draw a circle with your hand and a square with your foot on the same side at the same time.

name: The 'Clock' Foot Reach
desc: Stand on one leg. Touch your other foot to 12, 3, 6, and 9 o'clock. Don't fall.

name: The 'Double-Hand' Writing
desc: Try to draw a circle with your right hand and a line with your left hand at the same time.

name: The 'Rhythm' Tap
desc: Tap: 1-2, 1-2-3, 1. Create a beat with your feet while moving your head side to side.

name: The 'Counter' Rotate
desc: Rotate your head left and your hips right. Now switch. Coordination for the whole spine.

name: The Finger-to-Nose Riddle
desc: Close eyes. Touch your nose, then touch your left ear, then your right. Precision without sight.

name: The Cross-Hand Tap
desc: Tap your right hand to left foot, then left hand to right foot. Faster. Faster.

name: Seated Arch Lift
desc: While sitting, pull ball of foot toward heel without curling toes. Stealth foot core.

name: The Desk-Press Isometric
desc: Place hands under desk. Try to 'lift' it for 10s. Activates lats/triceps without moving.

name: Under-Table Toe Splay
desc: Spread toes wide inside shoes. Hold 5s. Do it 10 times during a call.

name: The Stealth Glute Pulse
desc: Squeeze left glute, then right, then both. Fast. Keeps blood flowing while sitting.

name: The 'Meeting' Chin Tuck
desc: Pull head straight back to create a double chin. Reverses 'Forward Head Posture'.

name: The 'Hidden' Pec Stretch
desc: Interlace fingers behind back while sitting. Lean forward slightly. Opens the chest.

name: The Stealth Shoulder Shrug
desc: Pull shoulders to ears, hold 5s, then pull them down to back pockets. Reset posture.

name: The Stealth Calf Stretch
desc: While standing, place one foot back and press the heel down. Invisible mobility.

name: The Stealth Hip Flexor Stretch
desc: Sit at edge of chair. Drop one knee toward floor behind you. Lean back.

name: The Stealth Wrist Circle
desc: Rotate wrists slowly under table. Smooth out any 'clicking' or 'catching'.

name: The Stealth Pelvic Floor Lift
desc: Squeeze/lift pelvic floor. Hold 10s. Foundation of deep core stability.

name: The Stealth Belly Wave
desc: Try to move only upper abs, then lower abs in a wave. Internal massage.

name: The Stealth Rib Shift
desc: Slide ribcage left and right while sitting. Wakes up obliques and QL muscle.

name: The Komodo Walk
desc: In low plank, crawl forward keeping hips as low as possible. Elbows close to ribs.

name: The Traveling Ape
desc: Deep squat. Place hands to side and hop feet over them. Lateral hip mobility.

name: The Crab Reach
desc: From crab, drive hips up and reach one arm over head and toward the floor behind you.

name: The Loaded Beast
desc: From all fours, push hips back toward heels, knees 1 inch off floor. Full body tension.

name: The Scorpion Reach
desc: Lie on stomach. Reach one foot across body to touch floor on opposite side.

name: The Bear Crawl (Static)
desc: On all fours, knees 1 inch off floor. Hold for 60s. Teaches core spinal support.

name: The Frog Squat Pulse
desc: Bottom of squat. Hands on floor. Straighten legs, then sink back down.

name: The Ape Reach
desc: Deep squat. Reach arms forward as far as possible while keeping heels on floor.

name: The Side-Kick Through
desc: From beast, rotate/kick one leg through. Supporting hand and foot stay glued.

name: The Crocodile Breath
desc: Face down, forehead on hands. Breathe so belly pushes into floor. Fixes shallow breathing.

name: The Beast Reach
desc: From beast, lift one arm and opposite leg. Reach them away from each other. Balance.

name: The Underswitch
desc: From beast, lift hand/foot, rotate body underneath, land in crab position.

name: The 'Heavy Book' Overhead Hold
desc: Hold heavy book overhead one hand. Walk for 60s. Shoulder girdle stability.

name: The Bottle-Pass RDL
desc: Hinge on one leg. Pass water bottle from left hand to right hand under body.

name: Backpack Side-Bend
desc: Hold backpack one hand. Lean toward it, pull back up using only side-waist.

name: The Shoe-Balance Squat
desc: Place shoe on closed fist. Reach it overhead. Squat without shoe falling.

name: The Water Bottle Halo
desc: Circle water bottle around head. Keep neck and core perfectly still.

name: The Backpack Overhead Squat
desc: Hold backpack overhead. Perform squat. High-level mobility and core test.

name: The 'Heavy Book' Press
desc: Sit tall. Press heavy book overhead. At top, shrug shoulders to ceiling.

name: The Bottle-Balance Walk
desc: Balance water bottle on head. Walk 20 steps. Forces perfect spinal alignment.

name: The Backpack Halo (Weighted)
desc: Circle backpack around head. High-tension core and shoulder work.

name: Tibialis Wall Lean
desc: Lean back against wall. Lift toes as high as possible. Protects the knees.

name: First Rib Towel Pull
desc: Loop towel over shoulder. Pull down while tilting head away. Clears arm nerve path.

name: The Doorway Pec Smash
desc: Lean chest into edge of doorway. Move arm up and down to 'shear' tight muscle.

name: The Scalene Stretch
desc: Sit on hand. Tilt head away and look up. Stretches deep neck muscles.

name: Ankle Dorsiflexion Wall-Rock
desc: Toes against wall. Drive knee forward to touch wall. Increase distance over time.

name: The 'Short Foot' Exercise
desc: Try to make foot shorter by pulling ball toward heel. Build the medial arch.

name: The 'Wall' Calf Smash
desc: Ball of foot on wall, heel on floor. Lean weight into wall. Intense stretch.

name: The Scapular Wall-Slide
desc: Back to wall. Arms in 'W'. Slide to 'V' and back. Shoulder health gold.

name: The Jaw-Hinge Massage
desc: Find masseter (jaw hinge). Massage with fingers while opening/closing mouth.

name: The Doorway Lat Stretch
desc: Grab doorway high. Lean hips away. Breathe into the side of the ribcage.

name: The Scalp Release
desc: Use fingertips to vigorously move skin of scalp. Releases tension in fascia.

name: The 'Wall' Ankle Rock
desc: Toes against wall. Drive knee toward wall. Increases ankle range for walking.

name: The Threaded Needle (Dynamic)
desc: From all fours, slide arm under/through, then reach same arm to sky. Follow eyes.

name: The Lion’s Breath
desc: Inhale deep, exhale forcefully with tongue out and eyes wide. Releases jaw.

name: 90/90 Diaphragmatic Breath
desc: Back on floor, feet on wall, knees 90. Breathe into lower back. Calms nerves.

name: The 'Empty' Coat Sleeve
desc: Stand wide. Twist torso and let arms flop/hit hips. Relaxes the spine.

name: The 'Ocean' Breath
desc: Inhale nose. Exhale 'Haaa' sound with mouth closed. Calming vibration.

name: The 'Hollow Body' Hang
desc: Hang from bar. Tuck tailbone, pull ribs down. Trains 'strong' posture.

name: The Standing Forward Fold (Heavy)
desc: Fold forward. Arms heavy. Shake head 'Yes' and 'No' to release neck.

name: The Child's Pose (Lat Variation)
desc: In child's pose, walk hands left and breathe into right side of ribs.

name: The Cat-Cow (Forearm)
desc: Perform cat-cow on forearms. Focuses movement on the middle spine.

name: The Standing 'T' Twist
desc: Arms out in T. Rotate torso as far as possible. Follow back hand with eyes.

name: The Forward Fold (Bent Knee)
desc: Fold forward, bend knees until chest touches thighs. Relaxes lower back safely.

name: The Savasana Breath
desc: Lie flat. Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 8s. Complete nervous system reset.

name: The Pogo Hop (Lateral)
desc: Keep legs straight. Hop side-to-side using only ankles. Reactive tendon 'spring'.

name: The Seal Clap
desc: Jump/clap hands in front and then behind back. Tests shoulder speed.

name: The Cross-Crawl March
desc: March in place, touching opposite elbow to knee. Brain-body connection.

name: The Lateral Lunge Hop
desc: Perform side lunge, then explosively hop to other side. Power and mobility.

name: The Skater Leap
desc: Jump side to side. Land softly and hold 1s. Glute stability.

name: The High Knee Skip
desc: Skip in place, pulling knees as high as possible. Explosive hip flexion.

name: The Butt-Kick Jog
desc: Jog in place, kicking heels to glutes. Dynamically stretches the quads.

name: The Lateral Shuffle
desc: Stay low in semi-squat. Move side to side quickly. Wakes up lateral hips.

name: The Seal Jack
desc: Jumping jack, but arms clap in front of chest. Opens the chest.

name: The Ankle Circle (Speed)
desc: Draw circle with foot as fast as possible for 30s. Builds ankle endurance.

name: The Pogo Hop (Forward/Back)
desc: Jump over imaginary line forward/back using only balls of feet.

name: The Star Jack
desc: Explosive jumping jack. In air, reach arms and legs as wide as possible into a star.

name: The 1000th Ripple
desc: Shake entire body from toes to head for 60 seconds. You are mobile. You are finished.
